name: Formula Low Poly Race: Time Trial
name_original: Formula Low Poly Race: Time Trial
description:
Racing Game alpha prototype. Try to get the best time! Share your time here! 

Controls:
-WASD and Arrows to move the car.

-R to Reload

-C to change camera. 

NOW WITH GAMEPAD SUPPORT!

-Right Trigger/Right Stick/Button A: Accelerate

-Left Trigger/Left Stick/Button X:  Brake 

-Button Y: Reload

-Button B: change camera. 

Enjoy!
